name: cmda
description: A command line tool for executing commands on, and copying files to/from AWS Lambda
author: Michael Hart <michael.hart.au@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mhart)

scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:lambda
scripts.package: npm run build:lambda && sam package --output-template-file packaged.yml --s3-bucket $(grep s3_bucket samconfig.toml | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d '" ')
scripts.publish-sar: npm run package && sam publish -t packaged.yml
